General.Name: Shandong Zhangqiu Blower Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Zhangqiu Blower Co., Ltd engages in the manufacture and sale of blowers and fans in China. It offers root and turbo blowers, screw blowers, centrifugal blowers and fans, slurry and industrial pumps, and liquid ring vacuum pumps, as well as pneumatic conveying products. The company exports its products to approximately 70 countries, including the European Union and North America. The company was formerly known as Shandong Zhangqiu Blower Factory Co., Ltd. Shandong Zhangqiu Blower Co., Ltd was founded in 1968 and is based in Jinan, China.
General.Address: East of Century Avenue, Jinan, China, 250200
